description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。现任中共甘孜藏族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is the current Secretary of the CPC Garzê Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党甘孜藏族自治州委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党甘孜藏族自治州委员会
中共甘孜藏族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在甘孜藏族自治州的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Garzê Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党甘孜藏族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CPC Garzê Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省济南市的市辖区。
description.en: A municipal district of Jinan, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 沈阳是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Shen Yang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党甘孜藏族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 2021年4月起，沈阳担任中国共产党甘孜藏族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Since April 2021, Shen Yang has served as the Secretary of the CPC Garzê Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 沈阳接替刘成鸣担任中国共产党甘孜藏族自治州委员会书记。
description.en: Shen Yang succeeded Liu Chengming as the Secretary of the CPC Garzê Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 沈阳是中华人民共和国公民。
description.en: Shen Yang is a citizen of the People's Republic of China.
Shen Yang is from Laiwu, Shandong.
